basics.name: Sebastian Collins
basics.label: Cloud Specialist
basics.summary: To fully explore my technological passions in the information era, by discovering and implementing the latest breakthroughs in the field. To help better the lives of my peers and peoples, while inspiring them grow and build on their innovations and completing their visions. I am playing my part to be responsible for driving the development and adoption of CLOUD services across Southern Africa and the world. I’d like to combine my passion and enthusiasm with my creativity and generate grass-roots attention about the CLOUD.

work.summary: AWS Support provides a unique combination of tools and expertise to help you plan, deploy, and optimize with confidence, giving you proactive guidance, best practices, launch support by highly skilled experts in the field.
highlights: Managing scale like never seen before. Dealing with unique customer issues which affect 10s of millions customers.
Teaching new hires and entrepreneurs about the mind boggling value proposition of the cloud and seeing them bring new ideas to life.
Working with some of the biggest companies in the world to help them solve their problems.
Designing and building fully-fledged architectures with cloud technologies, such as CloudFormation, encompassing CI/CD DevOps practices
Speaking at recruitment, university and customer engagements. From basic topics on the cloud to advanced topics such as managing large scale clusters though CI/CD pipelines.

work.summary: Provide complete, client inspired IT solutions, using the latest technologies and products.
highlights: Working with large South African enterprises around the country supporting and building their VOIP requirements.
Deploying standardized deployments across 100s of servers and switches around Southern Africa

work.position: Permanent Onsite Support Engineer (Knights Preparatory School)
work.summary: Permanently based at the school to provide and maintain their network.
highlights: Working on large fleets of Apple products (iPads) for the children.
Ensuring school Microsoft SAM requirements were met.

work.summary: Support, maintain and install the IT requirements at customers around South Africa
highlights: Finding creative solutions to make 8-bit factory milling software run on 64-bit operating systems.
Installing networking equipment, linking buildings and configuring devices.
MPLS, Wireless, Lan, Security and WAN troubleshooting.

work.summary: Provide support, maintenance and installation of IT requirements.
highlights: Wireless, Lan, Security and WAN troubleshooting.

Qualifications.title: 70-689: Upgrading Your Skills to MCSA Windows 8
National Senior Certificate (NSC) - Matric
Qualifications.awarder: UMALUSI Council for Quality Assurance in General and Further Education and Training
Qualifications.summary: The (NSC) examinations commonly referred to as “matric” has become an annual event of major public significance. It not only signifies the culmination of twelve years of formal schooling but the NSC examinations is a barometer of the health of the education system.

Qualifications.title: Deutsches Sprachdiplom (DSD) II
Qualifications.summary: DSD II, is an official German language certificate of the German education authorities and the Foreign Office (Germany) certifying levels of knowledge of the German language in schools worldwide.

Awards.title: Runner-up in National and Provincial Competitions in Mind sports South Africa (MSSA)
World Cyber Games (WCG) 2nd in Qualification Round (2010)
